cast.overview: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun and run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.
cast.title: Dark City

details.biography: Marques Kevin Johnson (born February 8, 1956) is an American former professional basketball player and actor who is currently a basketball analyst for the Milwaukee Bucks. He played college basketball for the UCLA Bruins and won a national championship in 1975. In his senior year, he won multiple national player of the year awards. He was a five-time NBA All-Star and played the majority of his career with the Bucks.
details.name: Marques Johnson
